verses.content: Kâwka um rawpa, rîng sukngar hlak chu, Kârloin se dar a ta, sukdam nâwkna um naw nih.
Mi felhai chu an hung hlâwk pha chun mihaiin an lâwmpui a, Mi khawhloin, rorêlna chu a phur pha ruok chun mihai chu an kahâk.
Varna hmangaitu chu a pa chunga chun a hlim a, Nawchizawr le inpâwlna neitu ruok chun a thuomhnaw a sukthâm.
Lal chun rorêlna felin ram chu a tungding a, Amiruokchu, thilthlâwnpêkhai dawngtu chun a suksiet.
Mi a tuolbâwm inpâkdertu chun, A kalchawihai ta dingin lên a pha a nih.
Mi suol bawsietnaa hin châng a um a, Mi fel ruok chun hla a sak a, a hlim hlak.
Mi fel chun mi pasie chungthu chu a hrietpui hlak a, Mi khawhlo chun hre dingin hrietthiemna a nei nawh.
Mi hmusittuhai chun khawpui chu meiin an rawh a, Mi varhai ruok chun lunginsen- na an hnawt hmang.
Mi varin mi invêt ân khingpui chun, A lunginsenin amanih, ân nuiin amani khawm, sâwldam um naw nih.
Mi feltak chu thisen insuo inhâwk mi chun a theidah a, Mi tluong ruok chun a hringna ding a zawng.
Mi invêt chun a lunginsenna thu po po a sâksuok hlak a, Mi var ruok chun a kawl tlat a, a sukdei hlak.
Rorêltuin thil indik naw thu a ngai chun, A siehlawhai po po chu an rilo hlak.
Mi pasie le nêksâwrtu chu an intuok a, LALPA chun anni mithai ve ve chu a sukvar a.
Lal, mi pasiehai ringumtaka ro rêlpêk hlaktu chu, A lalṭhungpha chu kumkhuoin tungding nîng a tih.
Hmawl le kâwkna hin varna a pêk a, Amiruokchu, naupang a khâta mâksan el hin a nu chu a sukzak hlak.
Mi khawhlohai chu an hlâwk pha chun, bawsietna khawm a pung hlak, Mi fel ruok chun an tlûkna chu hmûng an tih.
I naupa chu sukdik la, sâwldamna pêng a ti che, Anih, i lungrila chun lâwmna pêng a ti che.
Hmulâwkna um nawna hmuna chun mihai an bohmang hlak a, Dân vawng ṭhatu ruok chu a hlim a nih.
Siehlaw chu thu ngawt chun siem ṭhat ni naw nih a, Hrethiem sien khawm a pawisa âwm si nawh a.
A thuhaia inhmaw mi i hmu hlak am? Ama nêk chun mi invêta khawm beiseina a tam lem a nih.
Naupanga inthawka indawitaka a siehlaw sukpuitlingtu chun, A tâwpa chun naupa hung innitir a tih.
Mi lunginsen chun inkhingna a chawktho a, Mi lungsen hmang chu bawsietnain a sip a nih.
Mi chu a chapona chun ama chu sukhnuoi a ta, Lungrila inngaitlâwm ruok chun chawimawina hmûng a tih.
Rûkru inṭâwmpuina neitu chun ama lungril ngei khawm a theida hlak a, Ṭawngsie inphurna ri chu a hriet hlak a chu iengkhawm a sâksuok ngai nawh.
Mihriem ṭîna hin châng a hung siem a, LALPAA a ringna innghattu ruok chu him a tih.
Mi tamtakin rorêltu ditsakna chu an zawng hlak a, Amiruokchu, mihriem rorêlna chu LALPAA inthawka hung a nih.
Mi indik naw chu mi fel ta dingin tirdakum a ni a, Mi tluong chu mi khawhlo ta dingin tirdakum a ni ve thung.
